did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Impartial Umpire Files, 1934-1983
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: This file contains the awards of the umpires in those industries where an impartial umpire system has been established. Auto steel and meat packing are included at present, but others will be added.

controlaccess.head: Subjects:
controlaccess.subject: Arbitration, Industrial--United States--Cases
Iron and steel workers--Labor unions--United States
Arbitration, Industrial--Automobile industry--United States
Arbitration, Industrial-- Steel industry and trade--United States

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Impartial Umpire Files #6057. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
